quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.text: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: In order to be irreplaceable, one must always be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.text: Java is to JavaScript what car is to Carpet.
quotes.author: Chris Heilmann

quotes.text: Knowledge is power.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Fix the cause, not the symptom.
quotes.author: Steve Maguire

quotes.text: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
quotes.author: Whole Earth Catalog

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: It’s not a bug – it’s an undocumented feature.
quotes.author: Anonymous
